summary: Lonely lady seeking lonely Dragonborn man.
descriptionHtml:
Tess The Unridden
Author: Twisted Master

Her name was not always Tess the Unridden. Her birth name was Uthgerd the Unbroken.
Uthgerd the Unbroken was a lonely girl. Loving to adventure through Skyrim, but not wanting to go it alone.
Then one day she got an idea. If I change my name and dispostion, maybe people will like me more.
Then I would be alone no more. Alas Tess the Unridden was reborn. And so the story continues.

I have always believed that rather than add more to Skyrim, why not just improve what's there already.
And this is true of followers too. Skyrim + DLC gives you about 15 - 20 in game followers.
Though they are lacking in looks, character, and abilities.
But all that can be fixed. And Tess is but one example.
The reason I'm sharing this with the Nexas community is because she has recieved so little, much needed,
attention from the community.
Now since I already had Lydia as a Battlemage, I was still lacking a combat assassin type.
So Tess is set up as a missile combat assassin thief. This filled in the gap between other followers.
She is set essential.
She can be married.
She duel wields daggers.
She comes with duel daedric daggers, daedric bow, daedric arrows, cure poison potion, cure desease potion,
restore all potion, food and drink, and more bits and pieces.
Her relationship with player is as an ally.
She is also an ally and cousin of Lydia, an ally of Rayya, and ally of Serana.
She has a complete AI Package that includes: 3 eat times, 1 sleep package, 1 master package, and 1 sandbox current
location package.
She has the needed spells and perks relevent to her Specilizations.

Regarding load order: This is always how to do follower mods. First Load your follower control mod (UFO, AFT, etc). Second load any and all custom non game followers.
Last load any modified vanilla game followers (Such as Tess). This is so game followers can recognize custom non game followers.

Requirements:
Skyrim.esm, update.esm, dawnguard.esm, dragonborn.esm, and hearthfires.esm
SG Hairs by Hello Santa: http://pan.baidu.com/wap/link?uk=3574985185&shareid=2204221951&third=0
******A note here: Hello Santa Hairs comes with an ESM and an ESP. In order to load both as master I had to convert the ESP to a ESM.
I made no other changes to it and have included that ESM only in this mod. You still need to download SG Hairs and replace their
ESP with this ESM.

Whats included in this mod:
UNP Body by DIMONIZED: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
Tattoos for UNP female body by: candymanXXL: www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7834/?
SGHairPackAIO.esm (This is the ESP file from SG Hairs changed to an ESM, needed to do this because can only add ESM's as masters). Just copy/paste to your Skyrim data folder. Then go in data folder and delete the ESP.
TessTheUnridden.esp
meshes
textures
Images of Tess

A big thanks to:
Hello Santa: http://pan.baidu.com/wap/linkuk=3574985185&shareid=2204221951&third=0
candymanXXL:
www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7834/?
DIMONIZED UNP Body:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?
author: Twisted Master
